Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: RESULTS : Person - years of exposure among non - users of aspirin were : 75 , 761 to acetaminophen , 42 , 671 to rofecoxib 65 , 860 to celecoxib , and 37 , 495 to NS - NSAIDs .

Let's think step by step.

```
| Disease |
| --- |
| acetaminophen |
| rofecoxib |
| celecoxib |
| NS-NSAIDs |
```
Note: "NS-NSAIDs" is not a disease, but rather a category of drugs (non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs). However, it is listed in the paragraph as a separate entity, so it is included in the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to diseases:
```
| Disease |
| --- |
| acetaminophen |
| rofecoxib |
| celecoxib |
```
The entity "NS-NSAIDs" was removed since it refers to a category of drugs and not a specific disease.
